channel.title: Comments on: Palaeontology and Open Science roundup: September, 2018

item.title: By: Palaeontology And Open Science News For October – Brownite
item.dc:creator: Palaeontology And Open Science News For October – Brownite
item.description: […] Welcome to your usual roundup of interesting stuff that happened in the last month from the worlds of Open Science and Palaeontology! Enjoy, and let me know if I’ve missed anything out. Previous time. […]
